thread.title: Vince Wilfork weighs in on Florida police shooting - Nation
thread.title_full: Vince Wilfork weighs in on Florida police shooting - Nation

author: boston.com
title: Vince Wilfork weighs in on Florida police shooting - Nation
text:
Former Patriot’s defensive tackle Vince Wilfork has joined the ranks of athletes talking about police shootings.
Related Links Local Black Lives Matter activists applaud Elizabeth Warren’s forceful speech Elizabeth Warren to Black Lives Matter activist: ‘Let’s make it happen’ Get today’s headlines right in your inbox “I have nothing against [law enforcement], but at the same time you’re dealing with somebody that was shot dead” Wilfork said Thursday. He was referring to the death of Corey Jones, who was shot dead by a plain clothes police officer in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, early Sunday morning, the Boston Herald reports.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below “We have to figure it out as a society. Not just this case but the cases that’s been going on for a while now. We have to try to figure out a solution. I think everybody needs to be held accountable. Plain and simple,” he said.
Wilfork is from Boynton Beach, Fla., about 20 miles from Palm Beach Gardens where Jones was killed. According to the Herald , Wilfork said the two were so close he considers Jones family, and plans to visit his relatives this weekend.
Read the full story at the Boston Herald .
